trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.
This class cannot be inherited.

A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
There are more than fifty elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> enumeration and foreground color.
The background color is initialized to black.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> enumeration, foreground color, and background color.
The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of spaces between the lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
Gets the color of spaces between the hatch lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the background color for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> this method creates, cast as an object.
Gets the color of hatch lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the foreground color for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
Gets the hatch style of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
